instructions: Open the FaceTime app on your iPod touch. Tap the plus button (+) and type the person's phone number or email address . (Alternatively, select a contact from the list.) If you have the person's phone number or email address saved in your Contacts, start typing their name and then tap the name when it appears. Then tap Audio or Video . Tap the phone number or email address again, and then tap Audio (for an audio-only call) or Video . Your FaceTime call has been placed. If no one answers your call, tap Leave a Message to leave a message, tap Cancel to cancel the call, or tap Call Back to try calling back.
